Biography

Margaret was born about 1720. Margaret Bryan ...

On FamilySearch.org 4 sources of information for:

Life Sketch • Not real sure where the information for Margaret Bryan is all coming from, however, the dates currently entered do not add up properly. She is identified as born in 1690 in Pennsylvania, sources say they married in 1719 in Chester Pennsylvania (the accuracy of that information is questionable). There is a child born in 1710, before their supposed marriage in 1719, then no more children until 1731, at which time Margaret would be 41 years old. From 1731 until 1747 she had at least 7 children, a pretty unbelievable event considering that she was age 41 to 57 when all those children were born.

If the children are actually hers it would suggest she was born much later than 1690. Perhaps her husband had at least one wife before her and that wife was the mother of the child born in 1710.
